data.text: We travelled as 3 friends and shared a room. We had 1 king bed and a double sofa bed. Toiletries & towels were included, alongside tea & coffee. Excellent location - just a 2 minute walk to the Urquinaona metro station! We arrived 1 hour early before check in & our room was already ready so the gentleman on reception kindly checked us in. Although please be aware that you will not see staff members regularly, and make sure you read and understand the check in details before you arrive. The communication between WhatsApp was excellent & they are always happy to help. The room could have been cleaner - some splash marks alongside cupboards & towel hooks in the bathroom were loose, however did not effect our stay, just minor details to bear in mind. I also lost my bag but the staff were amazing at getting it back to me in time for my flight home.
data.title: Girls trip!

data.text:
This hotel is perfect for couples wanting a clean and comfy room to explore Barcelona from - the location is perfect and only a 20 minute walk from the Sagrada and is pretty central.

The consierge service on WhatsApp could not be more helpful and The lovely Gio greeted us when we arrived. Would 100% recommend and come back next time we are in Barcelona again.
data.title: Brilliant stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your wonderful comment. We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel clean and comfortable for exploring Barcelona. It's great to know that you appreciated our central location. We're delighted that our city team and WhatsApp service exceeded your expectations. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in Barcelona or anywhere around the globe.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text:
As soon as I entered I noticed the lack of a reception to refer to, to communicate it is necessary to speak via the internet.
"Staff" unavailable, we requested toilet paper several times but it was not given to us, the sheets are changed once a week, the blanket is joined with a duvet, even in the middle of August, mini fridge with high temperatures, of the 2 booked beds one was a sofa bed, with the bar bent and the mattress falling, suction system broken in the bathroom, window without mosquito net, air conditioning which, if turned on, hit the sleeper's face, in short, A DISASTER
data.title: Shabby from A to Z

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We apologize for the inconvenience you faced during your stay. In regards to your comments, we have customer service available 24/7 to assist you as well as an essentials cabinet on the 2nd floor for any extra amenities you would need after housekeeping hours. When booking is clear that the room booked is a double bed plus a sofa bed, and the mini fridges are made to keep a certain temperature not to cool as a regular refrigerator. Your feedback is valuable, and we're sorry to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations. We will review your comments and work towards improving our services and amenities for future guests. If you have any more specific feedback or suggestions, please feel free to share them with us. We appreciate your input, which helps us enhance the quality of our accommodations.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text:
Stayed here for 10 days in July 2023. We had a room with a king bed and a pull out couch for three people. We had 0 issues with entering Sonder. The app was very easy to use. However, the app was not accurate about the locker luggage storage. In the app it says it is not available at this location yet is is. The lobby that you enter in has the luggage storage and a water station for free to fill up reusable waters which is nice. 

We did pay for early check in and the room was not ready when we got there. This was a bummer after traveling all day. They said they would refund us the $40 early check in fee. 

Note there is no people working at this hotel physically. All communication is done remotely through the app. 

Upon first entering the room it is your standard hotel room. Nothing special but seems to be okay. Inside the room there is not a lot of storage. There is one standing shelf unit for you to hang your clothes in with a safe in it. There is also  mini fridge if you request it which we did. The king size bed was comfortable enough however note that they do not change the sheets during your stay. In the app there is a button to request a cleaning but then once you click on it, it says it is unavailable for this location.

The pull out sofa is very hard to pull out. Once out the metal bar that supports it can be felt every-time you sleep on it. Not comfortable at all.

Now, to get to the worst part. Throughout our stay one of us kept getting bug bites and we weren't sure from what. Well on the later half of our stay we found a massive spider in the middle of the night in the pull out bed. We also found four cockroaches in the bathroom during our stay. We were on the first floor so they have easier access but it was still unacceptable. We did complain to the company via the app and they did refund us our last night. 

Overall I would not recommend staying here in the future. Book a hotel nearby instead.
data.title: Book yonder - not at Sonder (bad experience)

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We are truly sorry to hear about the issues you encountered during your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and apologize for any inconvenience you experienced, including the inaccurate information about luggage storage in the app and the delayed check-in. We take guest feedback seriously and will work to address these concerns to ensure a better experience for our future guests. We regret that the cleanliness and comfort of the room did not meet your expectations, and we will investigate the pest issue immediately to prevent any reoccurrence. We value your input and will use it to improve our services and facilities. Thank you for bringing these matters to our attention, and we hope you'll give us another chance in the future to provide you with a more enjoyable and comfortable stay.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text: Sonder apparently acquired Vasanta hotel, fired all the staff, and attempt to manage the hotel with part time (at best) help.  They are totally unresponsive to requests.  The rooms are small so it’s nice to use the common area, however there was a lighting problem they REFUSED to fix, so we were stuck in the tiny room.  The shower floor is slick and thus dangerous, and they would not supply a mat.  No clean glasses all week.  Front door lock (code operated) was sticky. No hand towels, no fridge.  Stay away!
data.title: Customer service non-existent!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We sincerely apologize for the poor customer service experience you encountered during your stay. We understand the frustration caused by unresponsiveness and the lack of attention to your requests. This is not reflective of the level of service we strive to provide. We apologize for the lighting issue outside of your room and the lack of a shower mat, as well as the absence of clean glasses. We do have hand towels and also a fridge under request. We take your feedback seriously and will address these concerns with our team to ensure improvements are made. Please know that guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we regret that we fell short in this instance. We appreciate your feedback and will work diligently to rectify the issues you mentioned.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team
